SELECT Name, Specialization FROM Doctor WHERE DoctorCode IN (SELECT DoctorID FROM Admission GROUP BY DoctorID HAVING COUNT(PatientID) > 5);

SELECT strftime('%Y', Admission.AdmissionDate) AS Year, Department.DepartmentName, COUNT(*) AS DiazepamPrescriptions FROM Medication JOIN Admission ON Medication.AdmissionID = Admission.AdmissionID JOIN Department ON Admission.DepartmentID = Department.DepartmentCode WHERE Medication.MedicationDescription = 'Diazepam' GROUP BY Year, Department.DepartmentName;

SELECT year(Admission.AdmissionDate) AS Year, Department.DepartmentName, COUNT(Medication.MedicationDescription) AS Number_of_Prescriptions FROM Admission INNER JOIN Patient ON Admission.PatientID = Patient.PatientID INNER JOIN Doctor ON Admission.DoctorID = Doctor.DoctorCode INNER JOIN Department ON Admission.DepartmentID = Department.DepartmentCode INNER JOIN Medication ON Admission.AdmissionID = Medication.AdmissionID WHERE Medication.MedicationDescription = 'Diazepam' GROUP BY year(Admission.AdmissionDate), Department.DepartmentName

SELECT Diagnosis, Medications FROM Admission WHERE PatientID IN (SELECT PatientID FROM (SELECT PatientID, COUNT(*) as admission_count FROM Admission GROUP BY PatientID HAVING admission_count >= 2));

SELECT DISTINCT a.PatientID, p.Name, a.Diagnosis, m.MedicationDescriptionFROM Admission aJOIN Patient p ON a.PatientID = p.PatientIDJOIN Medication m ON a.AdmissionID = m.AdmissionIDWHERE a.AdmissionID IN (    SELECT AdmissionID    FROM Admission    GROUP BY AdmissionID    HAVING COUNT(AdmissionID) >= 2)

SELECT Doctor.Name, Doctor.Email FROM Doctor WHERE Doctor.DoctorCode IN (SELECT DoctorID FROM Admission WHERE AdmissionDate >= DATE('now', '-2 year') GROUP BY DoctorID HAVING COUNT(*) > 3);
SELECT d.Name, d.Email FROM Doctor d JOIN Admission a ON d.DoctorCode = a.DoctorID WHERE a.AdmissionDate >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 2 YEAR) GROUP BY d.Name, d.Email HAVING COUNT(a.PatientID) > 3

SELECT Doctor.Name AS DoctorName, Patient.Name AS PatientName, Admission.Diagnosis, Admission.Medications, Department.DepartmentName FROM Admission JOIN Patient ON Admission.PatientID = Patient.PatientID JOIN Doctor ON Admission.DoctorID = Doctor.DoctorCode JOIN Department ON Admission.DepartmentID = Department.DepartmentCode ORDER BY JULIANDAY(Admission.DischargeDate) - JULIANDAY(Admission.AdmissionDate) DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT d.Name, d.Specialization, p.DateOfBirth, p.MedicalRecord, a.Diagnosis, a.Treatments, a.Medications, d.Phone, d.Email FROM patient p, admission a, doctor d WHERE p.PatientID = a.PatientID AND a.DoctorID = d.DoctorCode AND a.DischargeDate = (SELECT MAX(dischargeDate) FROM admission) ORDER BY p.DateOfBirth

SELECT d.DepartmentName, d.HeadOfDepartment, COUNT(a.AdmissionID) AS AdmissionCount FROM Department d LEFT JOIN Admission a ON d.DepartmentCode = a.DepartmentID GROUP BY d.DepartmentName, d.HeadOfDepartment HAVING COUNT(a.AdmissionID) > 3

SELECT Name, PhoneNumber FROM Patient WHERE PatientID IN (SELECT PatientID FROM Admission GROUP BY PatientID HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT DepartmentID) > 1);

SELECT Doctor.DoctorCode, Doctor.Name, Doctor.Email, Doctor.Phone, strftime('%Y', Admission.AdmissionDate) AS Year, COUNT(*) AS ScanCount FROM Doctor JOIN Admission ON Doctor.DoctorCode = Admission.DoctorID WHERE Admission.Treatments LIKE '%CT Scan%' OR Admission.Treatments LIKE '%MRI Scan%' GROUP BY Doctor.DoctorCode, Year ORDER BY ScanCount DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT D.DoctorCode, D.Name, D.Phone, D.Email, COUNT(P.ProcedureDescription) AS TotalProcedures,        COUNT(CASE WHEN P.ProcedureDescription LIKE '%CT Scan%' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS CTScans,        COUNT(CASE WHEN P.ProcedureDescription LIKE '%MRI%' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) AS MRIs,        YEAR(A.AdmissionDate) AS Year FROM Doctor D JOIN Admission A ON D.DoctorCode = A.DoctorID JOIN Procedure P ON A.AdmissionID = P.AdmissionID GROUP BY D.DoctorCode, D.Name, D.Phone, D.Email, YEAR(A.AdmissionDate) ORDER BY TotalProcedures DESC

SELECT Doctor.*, Admission.Medications FROM Doctor JOIN Admission ON Doctor.DoctorCode = Admission.DoctorID WHERE Doctor.DoctorCode = (SELECT DoctorID FROM Admission GROUP BY DoctorID ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 1);

SELECT d.DoctorCode, d.Name, COUNT(a.AdmissionID) AS AdmittedPatients, GROUP_CONCAT(m.MedicationDescription SEPARATOR ', ') AS Medications FROM Doctor d JOIN Admission a ON d.DoctorCode = a.DoctorID JOIN Medication m ON a.AdmissionID = m.AdmissionID GROUP BY d.DoctorCode, d.Name ORDER BY COUNT(a.AdmissionID) DESC

SELECT m.MedicationDescription, COUNT(m.MedicationDescription) AS 'Count' FROM Medication m WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM m.AdmissionDate) = '2023' GROUP BY m.MedicationDescription ORDER BY COUNT(m.MedicationDescription) DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT Doctor.Name, Admission.AdmissionID, Patient.Name, (JULIANDAY(Admission.DischargeDate) - JULIANDAY(Admission.AdmissionDate)) AS LengthOfStay FROM Admission JOIN Doctor ON Admission.DoctorID = Doctor.DoctorCode JOIN Patient ON Admission.PatientID = Patient.PatientID ORDER BY LengthOfStay DESC LIMIT 1;

SELECT d.DoctorCode, d.Name, COUNT(a.AdmissionID) AS TotalAdmissions, AVG(dATEDIFF(a.DischargeDate, a.AdmissionDate)) AS AverageLengthOfStay FROM Admission a JOIN Doctor d ON a.DoctorID = d.DoctorCode GROUP BY d.DoctorCode, d.Name ORDER BY AVG(dATEDIFF(a.DischargeDate, a.AdmissionDate)) DESC
